article_title: We've Crossed The Tipping Point; Most Americans Now Receive Government Benefits

article_metadata.description: With the implementation of Obamacare, more than half of Americans are receiving some type of government benefit. That bodes ill for the future.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews
